## github-console
#### Manage github with console method.


#### Pypi [github-console](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/github-console)
### How to install ?
```bash
 cd ~
 git clone https://github.com/luoyeah/github-console
 cd github-console
 ./setup.py install
 
 github -h
```
### or

```bash
 pip install github-console
 
 github -h
```
